alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:39PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 945 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mermentau River near Mermentau. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Flooding of the shipyard begins. Portions of castex landing, la 3166, become flooded and impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 2.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue rising to a crest of 6.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 2.4 Wed 9 pm CST 3.6 4.9 5.9 &&
